inclusion.criterion: Intermediate or high risk patient for surgical aortic valve replacement (SAVR)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: STS/EuroSCORE II >4% or logistic EuroSCORE I >10%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Contraindications for open chest surgery, such as expected high perioperative risk due to comorbidities not adequately reflected by scores
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, recently noted abdominal mass, and presents with fevers/rigors and bandemia. She underwent EUS with biopsy, which showed pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
